verses.verse: A Song of Ascents. Many times they have distressed me from my youth, let Israel now say;
they have distressed me from my youth many times, yet they have not prevailed over me.
The ones plowing plowed on my back; they made their furrows long.
Jehovah is a righteous One; He cuts the cords of wicked ones.
Let them be ashamed and turned back, all those who hate Zion;
let them be like the grass on the rooftops, which dries up before it draws out;
with which the reaper does not fill his palm, and the binder of sheaves his bosom.
And those who pass by have never said, The blessing of Jehovah be on you; we bless you in the name of Jehovah.
